zjxpack.distances.naive_get_distances(p1, p2)¶
zjxpack.distances.naive_get_mic_distance(p1, p2, cell_param, pbc)¶

get the mic vector and its lenght from atom1 to atom2 at PBC

Parameters

  • p1 – atom 1 position [x, y, z] (numpy array)

  • p2 – atom 2 position [x, y, z] (numpy array)

  • param – cell parameter [a, b, c, alpha, beta, gamma] (numpy array)

  • ** (** only for alpha = 90 and beta = 90) –

Returns

mic vector from atom1 to atom2 D_len: norm of D

Return type

D
